Articles.Content:
Ive been noticing several people on the forums talking about making music for the game. Im not sure what the developers have planned but maybe they\'re up for a few suggestions. I\'ve made this thread to invite all those hoping to make music for the game to post their creations here. If they\'re all in one place, the devs are more likely to notice and more likely to want to use some of them.

So come one, come all, post your KSP soundtracks here for all to listen to and enjoy 8)
Thanks - I didn\'t have the motivation to make the thread but I should muster up enough to make some music

AC/DC usually does it well 8)

But I also use TSfH and GnR too

I\'m also making some right now and I\'ll post it when I\'m done
This thread (http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=11832.0) contains one such an attempt at fan music
Great stuff Rich - stuff like this will be much more agreeable than what I put out (expect an ambient/noise track today or tomorrow) - your tune has that... Rare feel, if you know what I mean!

This thread (http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=11832.0) contains one such an attempt at fan music

Please rise for the playing of the Kerbal National Anthem.
